//: GPIO Matrix Indexes, 0 = GPIO0, *not* 0 = pin 0
BUTTON
GPIO0 Strapping - Default: Pull-up - Button pressed pulls-down
SERIAL
RADIO (2x 2.4Ghz + 2x PA)
Single inductor fitted to first SX1280
Radio SPI uses SUBSPI pins
NRESET is active-low with 50k pull-up in SX1280
NSS is active-low, SX1280 MISO is high-impedance when NSS is high.
NSS 1/2 on SUBSPI pins with CS0/CS1 signals (respectively)
On the RFX2401C RX active is FALSE when TXEN is HIGH/ON
GPIO9 - S3 Low-level power-up glitch
GPIO15/XTAL_32K_P - S3 Low-level power-up glitch
Unused RXEN, pull-ups fitted to both PAs, TXEN HIGH disables RX
VTX
VTX is on FSPI pins (for CLK/CS0/MISO/MOSI)
VTX_SPILE (on FSPICS0 signal)
VTX_SPIDATA connected to 'vtx_miso' pin though 0ohm resistor
VTX_SPIDATA connected to 'vtx_mosi' pin though 330ohm resistor
VTX_SPISCK
GPIO21         - VTX_PA_BIAS_PWM - VTX PA RF bias voltage
GPIO1/ADC1_CH0 - VTX_PA_VPD      - PDET output voltage from VTX PA
GPIO33         - VTX_PA_EN       - HIGH = VTA_PA_ENABLED.  No S3 power-up-glitch.
OSD
UART connection for SPRacingPixelOSD via CanvasAPI
U1RXD            - OSDUART2_RX   - goes to TX on OSD
U1TXD            - OSDUART1_RX   - goes to RX on OSD
PWM
PWM outputs on 4 pins which double as JTAG pins, on S3 JTAG pins are not strapping pins, no buffers needed!
GPIO3 is pulled high via 10k resistor (located by IO_1 legend), which selects GPIO39-42 as the JTAG signal source
S1 Corner Pad - GPIO41/MTDI - JTAG 1/4
S2 Corner Pad - GPIO42/MTMS - JTAG 2/4
S3 Corner Pad - GPIO39/MTCK - JTAG 3/4
S4 Corner Pad - GPIO40/MTDO - JTAG 4/4
VBAT
ADC1_CH1 - ADC input via 100k/10k 10:1 voltage divider
CAM OSD CONTROL
PWM, Strapping pin for ROM messages on UART1, PD=messages enabled (default), PU=messages disabled
LED
DNC pins - pins are connected to internal flash/psram
